title: Fully Furnished Studios, On RTC bus lines, Complete Kitchenette
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-No long term lease required', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Easy freeway access', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-High speed WIFI included', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
